SEARCH

Package icyllis.arc3d.engine

package icyllis.arc3d.engine
Engine package provides the common part of Arc 3D rendering pipeline and the abstraction layer for different 3D graphics APIs.
  • Related Packages

    Represents a single device-visible memory region that may be used as mesh buffers and staging buffers.

    A pool of geometry buffers tied to a GpuDevice.
    GpuDevice
    Abstract base class that represents the logical device and graphics queue of the backend 3D API, holds a reference to DirectContext.
    GpuDevice.Stats
     
    GpuRenderTarget
    The GpuRenderTarget manages all objects used by a renderable primary surface, which are framebuffers, render passes and a set of attachments.
    GpuResource
    Base class for operating backend memory objects that can be kept in the ResourceCache.
    GpuResource.UniqueID
    An object with identity.
    GpuTexture
    Represents 2D textures can be sampled by shaders, can also be used as attachments of render targets.
    GpuTexture.ScratchKey
    Storage key of GpuTexture, may be compared with TextureProxy.
    GraphicsPipelineState
    Graphics pipeline state object (PSO of graphics pipeline).
    IGpuSurface
    Interface representing primary surface data.
    IScratchKey
    Marker interface for scratch resource keys.
    ISurface
    Defines Surface-hierarchy constants.
    IUniqueKey
    Marker interface for unique resource key, allows for exclusive use of a resource for a use case (AKA "domain").
    Key
    A key loaded with custom data.

    KeyBuilder.StringKeyBuilder
     
    LinkedListMultimap<K,V>
    Implementation of Multimap that uses an LinkedList to store the values for a given key.
    ManagedResource
    Base class for operating GPU resources that may be shared by multiple objects, in particular objects that are tracked by a command buffer.
    Mesh
    The interface used to receive geometry buffers from MeshDrawTarget for mesh-drawing operations.
    MeshDrawTarget
    Abstract interface that supports creating vertices, indices, and meshes, as well as invoking GPU draw operations.
    OpFlushState
    Tracks the state across all the GrOps (really just the GrDrawOps) in a OpsTask flush.
    OpsRenderPass
    The OpsRenderPass is a series of commands (draws, clears, and discards), which all target the same render target.
    PathUtils
    Tessellate paths.
    PipelineDesc
    This class is used to generate a generic pipeline cache key.
    PipelineInfo
    This immutable object contains all information needed to build a pipeline and set pipeline state for a draw.
